name: Guard
info: Recovers Action Point (AP)

name: Meditation
info: Cures statuses and gives concentration power (CP)

name: Single Slash
info: A single slash, done with a sharp object

name: Impact
info: An attack which uses something to bludgeon an opponent

name: Claw Slash
info: A series of scratches, made with claws

name: Triple Slashes
info: A quick succession of blows made with a cutting weapon

name: Flurry of Blows
info: A number of blunt attacks made in quick succession

name: Rapid Claws
info: A rapid, animalistic attack done with sharpened claws

name: Dancing Blade
info: A graceful, dance-like slash with a sharp weapon

name: Smashing Blow
info: The user puts all of their strength into their fist, inflicting heavy damage

name: Biting Attack
info: A nasty biting attack

name: Berserk
info: The user lets go of all finesse and wildly attacks their target

name: Shot
info: An attack made with a long ranged weapon

name: Arrows
info: A simple attack made with a bow

name: Hurl Boulder
info: Through a great feat of strength, the user flings a large stone at their target

name: Venom Claws
info: The user viciously attacks, their claws imbued with demon-like ferocity

name: Venom Shot
info: A bolt of venom is launched at the target, damaging and potentially poisoning them

name: Poison Breath
info: The user breaths out toxic fumes, damaging and poisoning enemies

name: Poison Dust
info: The user spreads poisonous dust into the air, damaging a target

name: Poison Bolt
info: The user launches a bolt of poison at a target, damaging them

name: Toxic Bomb
info: This deadly attack causes an explosion of poisonous gas, damaging multiple targets

name: Tornado Slashes
info: The user imbues their weapon with elemental air before delivering a devastating slash

name: Dust Blast
info: Summons a powerful gale that kicks up dust at a target

name: Air Cutter
info: With the use of vacuums, the user cuts their opponent with the very air

name: Gust
info: A powerful gust of wind is summoned, striking a target

name: Whirlwind
info: A swirling wind is summoned, striking a target

name: Tornado
info: A powerful, magical storm is summoned, striking multiple targets for wind damage

name: Fire Slash
info: The user imbues their weapons with elemental fire before delivering a devastating slash

name: Fire Breath
info: The user breathes fire, damaging a single target

name: Missile Launcher
info: A high explosive ordnance is launched from the demolitionist's cannon, dealing devastating fire damage to multiple targets

name: Fire Twist
info: Twisting flames wrap around the target, damaging them

name: Combust
info: The target suffers from spontaneous combustion, damaging them

name: Rings of Flames
info: A whirlwind of fire is conjured, damaging multiple targets

name: Ice Hammer
info: The user imbues their weapon with elemental ice, before delivering a devastating blow

name: Ice Cutter
info: Frozen, sharpened rings are hurled at the target

name: Ice Flash
info: The user flashfreezes their target, damaging them

name: Crystal Spike
info: A frozen, crystalline spike is launched at a single target

name: Avalanche
info: A devastating wave of ice and snow rains down on multiple targets

name: Lightning Slices
info: The user imbues their weapon with elemental lightning before delivering devastating slashes

name: Ball Lightning
info: An orb of lightning is hurled at the target

name: Thunder
info: Lightning is summoned to strike a single target

name: Thunder Chain
info: A chaining bolt of lightning strikes the target

name: Thunder Storm
info: The user summons a terrible, black storm, striking multiple targets

name: Holy Slash
info: The user imbues their attack with divine energy, ignoring all resistances

name: Holy Arrows
info: The user launches arrows forged from light, ignoring all resistances

name: Supernova
info: The user invokes incredible cosmic power, striking multiple targets for astral damage

name: Holy Bolt
info: The user throws a bolt of divine energy, ignoring all resistances

name: Ether Burst
info: This causes a powerful explosion infused with divine energy

name: Spell Disruption
info: Prevents the target from using magic

name: Terrorize
info: Terrorizes the target, causing them to lose a large amount of AP

name: Capture
info: If a monster is defeated with this skill, it will be transported to your prison MODDED

name: Astral Blade
info: A skill which can only be used in the Flow state, it delivers a series of blows infused with divine energy

name: Astral Flare
info: The single most potent holy magic spell in existence, this can only be used in the Flow State

name: whirlpool
info: (unused)
